@pmagelah. I have had a lot to say about that(term limits)-clearly I did! I don't think I will subject myself to answering this same qstn ..
@pmagelah ..for the rest of the time of this mandate I am serving!!!! The Ug.press and whoever they are quoting...have their right .....
@pmagelah ...to say whatever they want to say!! We may as well wait patiently to see what happens in the due course ...!
@pmagelah ...since talking too much about it one way or the other..is not what will decide what happens in the end....!
@Opiaiya. It is good,sometimes to have faith ...esp in this case it is well founded!!
@pmagelah. Isn't that really mere confusion?? Who are my colleagues you are talking about??? Do u really expect all people to have ...
@pmagelah ..views ..or do you want to dictate to any 1 how they shd think ....!!?? Do you want to hold me responsible for other pple's views
@pmagelah. I have been asked my views and have given my views without any ambiguity....many times....!
@pmagelah. But I am telling u I can't tell pple what to say... If u want my views I have said many time openly...! What happens(ed) in Ug...
@pmagelah ..is really Ugandans' business...! We Rwandans we sort out our business too...don't worry much about it...! We are able to do what
@pmagelah ..is right for us and may that fits other pple's expectations...
@pmagelah. This however doesn't mean Rwandans have same view on everything and need not ...
@Opiaiya. I think we u/stand very well what Rwanda is...it can't be another country, of course! Neither is Ug...Ethiopia or vice versa!!!

Yesterday we signed the project that creates the new Superintendence of Higher Education that will supervise all the universities and institutes.
This Superintendence will sanction misleading advertising and will give more protection to students in the face of possible abuses or breaches.
This Superintendency will make effective the legal prohibition of the profit that governs since 1981 for the universities and will sanction the offenders
Thank you Knut for the effort and wish Grete and Espen good luck! http://t.co/5xKaA452
To learn more about the project created by the Superintendency of Higher Education, I invite you to see this infographic http://t.co/hExbOgbK

We are at the APEC Summit looking for new markets for national exports that generate more jobs and progress for Chile.
We signed a Free Trade Agreement with Vietnam and the Pacific Agreement that creates the largest free trade zone in the world.
We visited the NOAA of the USA, the Pacific Tsunami Warning Center, to improve collaboration and communication with the Chilean SHOA.
